TopicTitle: A Thank you, from a long time fan.

Articles.Content:
Dear KSP Devs,
  
   MY name is LexingtonDelta in the Kerbal Community. I would like to take a moment to say Thank you for making such an amazing game that is not only fun and enjoyable, it teaches many things about space and aerodynamics, along with much MUCH more.

   I have over 1000 hours across all platforms and formats of KSP stating right around the time the "Moon" was discovered (when you put the moon in the game XD)

   Not only have you brought so much joy to me and my kids (they love to watch me play) but you brought joy to a lot of people, and allowed me to as well, as I used to sit in on your Live streams in the old days and gift copies of the game to community members who were interested but could not afford the game. I dug through old records of mine and recently realized i have bought over 125 Copies of the game! 4 for myself, PC and consoles, and 122 for the Community. I hope that all those i helped acquire the game found as much, if not more, enjoyment than I have in this game.

   In closing, I would like to say Tank you, and keep up the great work!

-LexingtonDelta

Moved to Kerbal Network.  

Thank you for contributing to the community!
